text:
Radoje Kontić (Радоје Контић) (born May 31, 1937) is a Montenegrin politician and technologist. He was born in Nikšić, Zeta Banovina, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. He was the last Chairman of the Socialist Republic of Montenegro's Executive Council from 1989 to 1991. He also was the Prime Minister of Yugoslavia from February 9, 1993 until May 19, 1998 when he lost a no-confidence vote.
He was a member of the League of Communists of Montenegro and later a member of the Democratic Party of Socialists of Montenegro.

annotations.surface_form: Democratic Party of Socialists of Montenegro
